Our college is one of the leading institutes in the region, offering undergraduate and postgraduate programs in Engineering, IT, Management, and more. It is affiliated to XYZ University and approved by AICTE.

We offer programs in:
- B.Tech (CSE, IT, ECE, Mechanical, Civil, Electrical)
- M.Tech
- MBA
- MCA
- Various diploma and certification courses.
Admissions are based on entrance exams (like JEE, CET, or university entrance test) and merit. You can apply through the official admission portal of our college.

patterns: How much does it cost per year?
responses: The fee structure varies depending on the course. You can refer 'fees' section on our website.
Yes, we provide scholarships based on merit, government schemes, and financial background. Students excelling in academics, sports, or extracurriculars may also be eligible.
Our dedicated placement cell brings in top recruiters like Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Amazon, and Accenture. Average package ranges between 5‚Äì7 LPA, with the highest packages going above 20 LPA.

Our campus includes:
- Modern classrooms & labs
- Digital library
- Hostel & canteen facilities
- Sports grounds & gym
- Student clubs & cultural societies.
Our faculty members are highly qualified with industry and academic experience. Many hold PhDs and actively participate in research, publications, and conferences.
We organize annual cultural and technical fests, hackathons, workshops, seminars, and orientation programs. Students actively participate in inter-college competitions too.

patterns: How can I contact the college?

The college is located at G-8 Area, Rajouri Garden, New Delhi-110064. Nearest metro station is Subhash Nagar Metro, and buses frequently connect the campus to major parts of the city.
College timings for morning batches are from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM, Monday to Friday and for evening batches are from 10:00 AM to 5:30 PM. Administrative offices remain open till 5:00 PM.
Our library provides 10,000+ books, e-resources, research papers, and journals. Students have access to digital databases and study spaces.
No, there are no hostels provided but there are several options for pg near the campus which you can refer.
We provide transport facilities through college buses covering major city routes. Public transport like metro and city buses also connect the campus conveniently.
We encourage students to join clubs like GFS, Aura, music, dance, tech and more. Sports facilities include cricket, football, basketball, and indoor games.
